course_title: Topics in Theatre - TOPICS IN THTR

sections.comments: Special Topic: Race and Performance. If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - THTR 440B, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/1h45mins synchronous Zoom per week on Thursdays 9:30am  11:15 am PST. The rest of the allocated time will be "made up" through weekly asynchronous activities, including but not limited to viewing performances/media, doing writing and/or creative responses, etc.

description: An examination in depth of a selected area of theatre history, theory or practice. Topics will change from year to year. May be repeated for credit when topics differ.
